post_content_localized.en:
South Beach is a frequent romantic destination for couples with its white powder sands, palm-lined avenues, and cultural destinations to explore as a pair. A secluded getaway overlooking Miami Beach, Sagamore Hotel is the perfect retreat for couples. From our sexy zero-gravity pool to stellar dining options, Sagamore Hotel is stocked with romantic must-haves. Plan an intimate beach vacation at Sagamore for a relaxing start to happily ever after.

The Perfect Hideaway

Browse our rotating contemporary art exhibitions and take a romantic stroll through our newly-renovated sculpture garden amid scenic outdoor seating areas and lush landscaping. Our 102-room boutique hotel means unmatched attention. Our spacious suites are equipped with a whirlpool tub, mini-bar, posh Molten Brown bath amenities, and a flat screen TV offering On Demand - all the makings for the perfect in-suite date night. Your glimpse into Miami’s Art Deco scene paired with the art culture of the property transcends into your private room complete with pops of color and sleek and luxurious bedding.

Book our two-story bungalow finished with a spiral staircase, terrace views of our surrounding lush garden, and a comfortable king bed for a truly indulgent romantic retreat for two. It doesn’t have to be your honeymoon to plan the ultimate beach vacation. We make privacy a priority. Begin each day on your upstairs balcony and greet the sunrise as it slowly rises over South Beach.

Fall in Love with our Signature Dining Venues

Guests never have far to travel for a delicious meal and cocktail. For a handcrafted cocktail or bottle of bubbly to cheers to love, visit our Pool Bar for happy hour and relax poolside as you soak up the rays. Under the direction of Executive Chef Michael Smerda, Sagamore Hotel’s signature restaurant Canvas serves up progressive culinary creations. From small bites to healthy and innovative salad bowls, Chef Smerda’s contemporary cuisine showcases local flavors and fresh catch paired with the ambiance of our romantic artsy oasis. Enjoy breakfast in bed with our in-room dining menu or opt for a night in with our late night options delivered straight to your door. Your dining experience is our Canvas.

Plan Your Romantic Retreat with Sagamore Hotel

Whether you are on your honeymoon or just want to get away from it all, our luxury beachfront hotel is here to assist with your seductive stay. Share a photo at #SagamoreIsArt and stay up-to-date with us by following the Sagamore Instagram or Facebook for vacation inspiration, new exhibitions, exclusive savings for couples, and SoBe happenings.

Choose from our best rates and special offers when you book direct with Sagamore Hotel, an iconic Miami Beach destination known for its unique collection of contemporary art, spacious suites, and prime location only steps from the white sands of South Beach.
